members.member:
Construct a Brace.
The Brace's center line. The Brace's profile. The Brace's material. The Brace's up axis. The setback of the Brace's geometry at the start. The setback of the Brace's geometry at the end. [JsonConstructor]

member.name: M:Hypar.Geometry.Polygon.Contains(Hypar.Geometry.Polygon)
member.summary: Tests if the supplied Polygon is within the perimeter of this Polygon.
member.returns: Returns true if every vertex of the supplied Polygon falls within the perimeter of this Polygon.

member.name: M:Hypar.Geometry.Polygon.Covers(Hypar.Geometry.Polygon)
member.summary: Tests if the supplied Polygon is within or coincident with the perimeter of this Polygon.
member.returns: Returns true if every vertex of the supplied Polygon falls within or on the perimeter of this Polygon.

member.name: M:Hypar.Geometry.Polygon.Disjoint(Hypar.Geometry.Polygon)
member.summary: Tests if this Polygon and the supplied Polygon are coincident in any way.
member.returns: Returns true if this Polygon and the supplied Polygon do not intersect or touch.

member.name: M:Hypar.Geometry.Polygon.Intersects(Hypar.Geometry.Polygon)
member.summary: Tests if this Polygon and the supplied Polygon share areas within their perimeters.
member.returns: Returns true if any vertex of either Polygon is within the perimeter of the other.

member.name: M:Hypar.Geometry.Polygon.Touches(Hypar.Geometry.Polygon)
member.summary: Tests if this Polygon and the supplied Polygon share at least one perimeter point without interesecting.
member.returns: Returns true if this Polygon and the supplied polygon share at least one perimeter point.

member.name: M:Hypar.Geometry.Polygon.Difference(Hypar.Geometry.Polygon)
member.summary: Constructs the geometric difference between this Polygon and the supplied Polygon.
member.returns: Returns a list of Polygons representing the subtraction of the supplied Polygon from this Polygon. Returns null if the area of this Polygon is entirely subtracted. Returns a list containing a representation of the perimeter of this Polygon if the two Polygons do not intersect.

member.name: M:Hypar.Geometry.Polygon.Intersection(Hypar.Geometry.Polygon)
member.summary: Constructs the Polygon intersections between this Polygon and the supplied Polygon.
member.returns: Returns a list of Polygons representing the interesction of this Polygon with the supplied Polygon. Returns null if the two Polygons do not intersect.

member.name: M:Hypar.Geometry.Polygon.Union(Hypar.Geometry.Polygon)
member.summary: Constructs the geometric union between this Polygon and the supplied Polygon.
member.param: The Polygon to be combined with this Polygon.
member.returns: Returns a single Polygon from a successful union. Returns null if a union cannot be performed on the two Polygons.

member.name: M:Hypar.Geometry.Polygon.XOR(Hypar.Geometry.Polygon)
member.summary: Returns Polygons representing the symmetric difference between this Polygon and the supplied Polygon.
member.returns: Returns a list of Polygons representing the symmetric difference of this Polygon and the supplied Polygon. Returns a representation of this Polygon and the supplied Polygon if the Polygons do not intersect.
